sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Rand.Seed procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by Rand.Next. Each restart with the same seed causes Rand.Next to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.
sections.text_content: The Rand.Seed procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by Rand.Next. Each restart with the same seed causes Rand.Next to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.
sections.mdown_content: The **Rand.Seed** procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by **Rand.Next**. Each restart with the same seed causes **Rand.Next** to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Rand.Seed, not by calling Seed.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Rand.Seed, not by calling Seed.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Rand.Seed**, not by calling **Seed**.
